title: More than blood and bandages
creator_credit: Brian Hannant, Nicholas Cockram, South Australian Film Corporation and Slater Studios
brief_description: A documentary designed to make the public aware of the variety of activities in which the Red Cross is involved. Shows the Red Cross responding to the needs of the sick, the handicapped, the disabled and the distressed.
creator_credit_for_label: Brian Hannant, Nicholas Cockram, South Australian Film Corporation and Slater Studios
